text: ane jo ame tene gera arabi bhasamam avatarita karata, to kaheta ke ani ayato spasta rite varnana karavamam kema na avi? A sum, kitaba gera arabi ane payagambara arabana? Tame kahi do! Ke a to imanavala'o mate margadarsana ane roga-nivarana che ane je'o imana nathi lavata temana mate kanamam bhara ane ankhamam andhakara che, a te loko che, je'one durathi pokaravamam ave che
